data.eml:eml: Five new species of Rohrthrips (Thysanoptera: Rohrthripidae) from Burmese amber, and the evolution of Tubulifera wings

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ulitzka, Manfred R. (2019): Five new species of Rohrthrips (Thysanoptera: Rohrthripidae) from Burmese amber, and the evolution of Tubulifera wings. Zootaxa 4585 (1): 27-40, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4585.1.2
